subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Chauncey Billups had 19 points and 7 assists and played a key role in the decisive run of the game, leading Detroit to a 91-72 win over Orlando on Saturday night.
snippet: Chauncey Billups had 19 points and 7 assists and played a key role in the decisive run of the game, leading Detroit to a 91-72 win over Orlando on Saturday night.
